product_name: Pedro's Bike Lust Silicone Polish - 16 oz.
long_description: Keep it fresh, keep it clean with the Pedro's Bike Lust silicone polish, which helps protect against UV, adds shine and buffs out scratches. Water-based silicone emulsion bicycle polish includes a biodegradable cleaner to remove light amounts of grime from frames. Repeated usage builds a protective surface that makes future cleaning easier; can be used on tires to help shed mud.
short_description: Keep it fresh, keep it clean with the Pedro's Bike Lust silicone polish, which helps protect against UV, adds shine and buffs out scratches.
